---
title: Transition to Operations
---

Our ultimate goal is to develop a Research to Operations Plan that will transition our science to using PAM-Gliders to address our management needs. This plan will be outlined in a National Strategy RoadMap for PAM-Glider Operations.

![](figs/PAMGliderRoadmap.png){width="260"}

This will include:

-   Accelerate Pacific-Wide PAM-Glider Operations

-   Match appropriate technology to research questions

-   Provide a framework to monitor technological developments

-   Identify future investment needs
